Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig

Class WlsRetriever

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig.WlsRetriever

  • public class WlsRetriever
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to retrieve configuration or health information from WebLogic servers. It also contains method to perform configuration updates to a WebLogic domain.

      • WlsRetriever

        public WlsRetriever​(java.lang.String namespace,
                    java.lang.String asServiceName,
                    java.lang.String adminSecretName)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        namespace - The Namespace in which the target Domain is located.
        asServiceName - The name of the Kubernetes Service which provides access to the Admin Server.
        adminSecretName - The name of the Kubernetes Secret which contains the credentials to authenticate to the Admin Server.

      • readConfig

        public WlsDomainConfig readConfig​()
        Returns from admin server selected server configurations of all WLS servers configured in the domain. The method would repeatedly try to connect to the admin server to retrieve the configuration until the configured timeout occurs.
        Returns:
        A WlsClusterConfig object containing selected server configurations of all WLS servers configured in the domain that belongs to a cluster. This method returns an empty configuration object even if it fails to retrieve WLS configuration from the admin server.
